puakma.addin.http
Class HTTPServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      puakma.addin.http.HTTPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorDetect, java.lang.Runnable
public class HTTPServer
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ErrorDetect

HTTPServer is Puakma's web server. It is loaded as an addin
